title: Impact of the Pandemic on Juvenile and Family Courts
itunes:title: Impact of the Pandemic on Juvenile and Family Courts
description:
Judge David Katz of the Superior Court of New Jersey, the President of the National Council of Juvenile and Family Court Judges, discusses the impact of the pandemic on the juvenile and family courts and initiatives of the judicial organization.

June Grasso hosts. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
